arguments.huntSearchQuery: @timestamp:{ {{vars.huntStartDateTime}} TO {{vars.huntEndDateTime}} } AND event_type:"sysmon" AND event_id:"10" AND event_data.TargetImage:"C:\\Windows\\system32\\lsass.exe"

arguments.name: ElasticSearch

params.query: event_type:sysmon AND event_id:"1" AND ((image_path:"{{ vars.item._source.event_data.SourceImage | replace( "\\", "\\\\" )}}" AND event_data.ProcessId:"{{ vars.item._source.event_data.SourceProcessId }}") OR (parent_image_path:"{{ vars.item._source.event_data.SourceImage | replace( "\\", "\\\\" )}}" AND event_data.ParentProcessId:"{{ vars.item._source.event_data.SourceProcessId }}")) AND  computer_name:"{{vars.item._source.computer_name}}"
